constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Texas:
H.R. 4253.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Necessary and propper clause: Article 1, Section 8, Clause
18
[Page H3580]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate a national primary drinking water regulation for chromium-6, and for other purposes.
